title: Go routine in a tight loop stops other routines from executing
body:
by **anton.hendriks**: 
What steps will reproduce the problem?
http://play.golang.org/p/heacI2YH5Z

What is the expected output?
I would expect the program to exit after a millisecond.

What do you see instead?
It runs infinitely (haven't had it exit)

Which operating system are you using?
Fedora 16

Which version are you using?  (run 'go version')
go version go1.1.2 linux/amd64

Please provide any additional information below.
The code provided is rather simple. I encountered it with more elaborate code, but the
problem could be reproduced with the code provided.

Thanks.
